snippet: Jeffrey L. Williams was charged with assault in the shooting of two officers during a demonstration last week outside Police Headquarters in Ferguson, Mo.
abstract: Ferguson, Mo, law enforcement officials say they have charged Jeffrey L Williams with shooting two police officers during protest outside city's Police Headquarters; Williams claims shooting police was accidental because he was aiming at someone else.

byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and JOHN ELIGON
byline.contributor: Manny Fernandez reported from Ferguson, and John Eligon from Kansas City, Mo.

lead_paragraph: Jeffrey L. Williams was charged with assault in the shooting of two officers during a demonstration last week outside Police Headquarters in Ferguson, Mo.

headline.main: Man, 20, Is Arrested in the Shooting of 2 Officers in Ferguson
headline.print_headline: Suspect, 20, Is Arrested in the Shooting of 2 Police Officers in Ferguson
